# Research questions
Rice consumption vs. latitude and region, 2015


# Data
```{r read_data, echo = FALSE}
Assignment4_data <- read_csv("Data/rice-consumption-vs-latitude.csv")
data_tidy <- Assignment4_data %>%
  filter(Year == 2015)
data_tidy <- data_tidy %>% drop_na(`Rice (Milled Equivalent) - Food supply quantity (kg/capita/yr)`) %>% drop_na(`Latitude - lp_lat_abst`)
```


# Analysis
```{r table-1}

knitr::kable(
  head(arrange(data_tidy,desc(`Rice (Milled Equivalent) - Food supply quantity (kg/capita/yr)`)),20), caption = 'Rice consumption',
  booktabs = TRUE,digits = 2
) %>%
kable_styling(latex_options = c("striped", "hold_position"))
```


```{r fig-1, echo = FALSE, fig.align = "center", fig.width = 7, fig.cap ="Annual per capita consumption of rice in different countries"}
ggplot(data = data_tidy, 
aes(x = `Latitude - lp_lat_abst`,
    y = `Rice (Milled Equivalent) - Food supply quantity (kg/capita/yr)`)) +
 geom_point(aes(colour = Continent)) +
 geom_point(data = data_tidy,
 size = 2,
 shape = 1)+theme_bw()

```

根据表1我们可以看出，具有最大大米消费量的前5个国家是Thailand, Philippines,Sri Lanka
